product_name: Outdoor Research Radiant Graphic Beanie - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The women's Outdoor Research Radiant Graphic Beanie is built of soft, warm, quick-drying Radiant Fleece(TM) and uses flat-seam construction along the earband for maximum comfort. Radiant Fleece is 95% breathable polyester with 5% spandex added for great stretch and shape retention. Contoured earband provides additional back-of-neck coverage. Outdoor Research Radiant Graphic Beanie features an eye-catching pattern for a touch of style. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Outdoor Research Radiant Graphic Beanie is built of soft, warm, quick-drying Radiant Fleece(TM) and uses flat-seam construction along the earband for maximum comfort.
